51static int
52nouveau_display_vblank_handler(struct nvif_notify *notify)
53{
54 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc =
55 container_of(notify, typeof(*nv_crtc), vblank);
56 drm_handle_vblank(nv_crtc->base.dev, nv_crtc->index);
57 return NVIF_NOTIFY_KEEP;
58}
59
60int
61nouveau_display_vblank_enable(struct drm_device *dev, unsigned int pipe)
62{
63 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
64 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
65 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
66 if (nv_crtc->index == pipe) {
67 nvif_notify_get(&nv_crtc->vblank);
68 return 0;
69 }
70 }
71 return -EINVAL;
72}
73
74void
75nouveau_display_vblank_disable(struct drm_device *dev, unsigned int pipe)
76{
77 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
78 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
79 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
80 if (nv_crtc->index == pipe) {
81 nvif_notify_put(&nv_crtc->vblank);
82 return;
83 }
84 }
85}
86
87static inline int
88calc(int blanks, int blanke, int total, int line)
89{
90 if (blanke >= blanks) {
91 if (line >= blanks)
92 line -= total;
93 } else {
94 if (line >= blanks)
95 line -= total;
96 line -= blanke + 1;
97 }
98 return line;
99}
100
101static int
102nouveau_display_scanoutpos_head(struct drm_crtc *crtc, int *vpos, int *hpos,
103 ktime_t *stime, ktime_t *etime)
104{
105 struct {
106 struct nv04_disp_mthd_v0 base;
107 struct nv04_disp_scanoutpos_v0 scan;
108 } args = {
109 .base.method = NV04_DISP_SCANOUTPOS,
110 .base.head = nouveau_crtc(crtc)->index,
111 };
112 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(crtc->dev);
113 struct drm_vblank_crtc *vblank = &crtc->dev->vblank[drm_crtc_index(crtc)];
114 int ret, retry = 20;
115
116 do {
117 ret = nvif_mthd(&disp->disp, 0, &args, sizeof(args));
118 if (ret != 0)
119 return 0;
120
121 if (args.scan.vline) {
122 ret |= DRM_SCANOUTPOS_ACCURATE;
123 ret |= DRM_SCANOUTPOS_VALID;
124 break;
125 }
126
127 if (retry) ndelay(vblank->linedur_ns);
128 } while (retry--);
129
130 *hpos = args.scan.hline;
131 *vpos = calc(args.scan.vblanks, args.scan.vblanke,
132 args.scan.vtotal, args.scan.vline);
133 if (stime) *stime = ns_to_ktime(args.scan.time[0]);
134 if (etime) *etime = ns_to_ktime(args.scan.time[1]);
135
136 if (*vpos < 0)
137 ret |= DRM_SCANOUTPOS_IN_VBLANK;
138 return ret;
139}
140
141int
142nouveau_display_scanoutpos(struct drm_device *dev, unsigned int pipe,
143 unsigned int flags, int *vpos, int *hpos,
144 ktime_t *stime, ktime_t *etime,
145 const struct drm_display_mode *mode)
146{
147 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
148
149 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
150 if (nouveau_crtc(crtc)->index == pipe) {
151 return nouveau_display_scanoutpos_head(crtc, vpos, hpos,
152 stime, etime);
153 }
154 }
155
156 return 0;
157}
158
159int
160nouveau_display_vblstamp(struct drm_device *dev, unsigned int pipe,
161 int *max_error, struct timeval *time, unsigned flags)
162{
163 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
164
165 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
166 if (nouveau_crtc(crtc)->index == pipe) {
167 return drm_calc_vbltimestamp_from_scanoutpos(dev,
168 pipe, max_error, time, flags,
169 &crtc->hwmode);
170 }
171 }
172
173 return -EINVAL;
174}
175
176static void
177nouveau_display_vblank_fini(struct drm_device *dev)
178{
179 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
180
181 drm_vblank_cleanup(dev);
182
183 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
184 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
185 nvif_notify_fini(&nv_crtc->vblank);
186 }
187}
188
189static int
190nouveau_display_vblank_init(struct drm_device *dev)
191{
192 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(dev);
193 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
194 int ret;
195
196 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
197 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
198 ret = nvif_notify_init(&disp->disp,
199 nouveau_display_vblank_handler, false,
200 NV04_DISP_NTFY_VBLANK,
201 &(struct nvif_notify_head_req_v0) {
202 .head = nv_crtc->index,
203 },
204 sizeof(struct nvif_notify_head_req_v0),
205 sizeof(struct nvif_notify_head_rep_v0),
206 &nv_crtc->vblank);
207 if (ret) {
208 nouveau_display_vblank_fini(dev);
209 return ret;
210 }
211 }
212
213 ret = drm_vblank_init(dev, dev->mode_config.num_crtc);
214 if (ret) {
215 nouveau_display_vblank_fini(dev);
216 return ret;
217 }
218
219 return 0;
220}
221
222static void
223nouveau_user_framebuffer_destroy(struct drm_framebuffer *drm_fb)
224{
225 struct nouveau_framebuffer *fb = nouveau_framebuffer(drm_fb);
226 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(drm_fb->dev);
227
228 if (disp->fb_dtor)
229 disp->fb_dtor(drm_fb);
230
231 if (fb->nvbo)
232 drm_gem_object_unreference_unlocked(&fb->nvbo->gem);
233
234 drm_framebuffer_cleanup(drm_fb);
235 kfree(fb);
236}
237
238static int
239nouveau_user_framebuffer_create_handle(struct drm_framebuffer *drm_fb,
240 struct drm_file *file_priv,
241 unsigned int *handle)
242{
243 struct nouveau_framebuffer *fb = nouveau_framebuffer(drm_fb);
244
245 return drm_gem_handle_create(file_priv, &fb->nvbo->gem, handle);
246}
247
248static const struct drm_framebuffer_funcs nouveau_framebuffer_funcs = {
249 .destroy = nouveau_user_framebuffer_destroy,
250 .create_handle = nouveau_user_framebuffer_create_handle,
251};
252
253int
254nouveau_framebuffer_init(struct drm_device *dev,
255 struct nouveau_framebuffer *nv_fb,
256 struct drm_mode_fb_cmd2 *mode_cmd,
257 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo)
258{
259 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(dev);
260 struct drm_framebuffer *fb = &nv_fb->base;
261 int ret;
262
263 drm_helper_mode_fill_fb_struct(fb, mode_cmd);
264 nv_fb->nvbo = nvbo;
265
266 ret = drm_framebuffer_init(dev, fb, &nouveau_framebuffer_funcs);
267 if (ret)
268 return ret;
269
270 if (disp->fb_ctor) {
271 ret = disp->fb_ctor(fb);
272 if (ret)
273 disp->fb_dtor(fb);
274 }
275
276 return ret;
277}
278
279static struct drm_framebuffer *
280nouveau_user_framebuffer_create(struct drm_device *dev,
281 struct drm_file *file_priv,
282 struct drm_mode_fb_cmd2 *mode_cmd)
283{
284 struct nouveau_framebuffer *nouveau_fb;
285 struct drm_gem_object *gem;
286 int ret = -ENOMEM;
287
288 gem = drm_gem_object_lookup(dev, file_priv, mode_cmd->handles[0]);
289 if (!gem)
290 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
291
292 nouveau_fb = kzalloc(sizeof(struct nouveau_framebuffer), GFP_KERNEL);
293 if (!nouveau_fb)
294 goto err_unref;
295
296 ret = nouveau_framebuffer_init(dev, nouveau_fb, mode_cmd, nouveau_gem_object(gem));
297 if (ret)
298 goto err;
299
300 return &nouveau_fb->base;
301
302err:
303 kfree(nouveau_fb);
304err_unref:
305 drm_gem_object_unreference(gem);
306 return ERR_PTR(ret);
307}
308
309static const struct drm_mode_config_funcs nouveau_mode_config_funcs = {
310 .fb_create = nouveau_user_framebuffer_create,
311 .output_poll_changed = nouveau_fbcon_output_poll_changed,
312};
313
314
315struct nouveau_drm_prop_enum_list {
316 u8 gen_mask;
317 int type;
318 const char *name;
319};
320
321static struct nouveau_drm_prop_enum_list underscan[] = {
322 { 6, UNDERSCAN_AUTO, "auto" },
323 { 6, UNDERSCAN_OFF, "off" },
324 { 6, UNDERSCAN_ON, "on" },
325 {}
326};
327
328static struct nouveau_drm_prop_enum_list dither_mode[] = {
329 { 7, DITHERING_MODE_AUTO, "auto" },
330 { 7, DITHERING_MODE_OFF, "off" },
331 { 1, DITHERING_MODE_ON, "on" },
332 { 6, DITHERING_MODE_STATIC2X2, "static 2x2" },
333 { 6, DITHERING_MODE_DYNAMIC2X2, "dynamic 2x2" },
334 { 4, DITHERING_MODE_TEMPORAL, "temporal" },
335 {}
336};
337
338static struct nouveau_drm_prop_enum_list dither_depth[] = {
339 { 6, DITHERING_DEPTH_AUTO, "auto" },
340 { 6, DITHERING_DEPTH_6BPC, "6 bpc" },
341 { 6, DITHERING_DEPTH_8BPC, "8 bpc" },
342 {}
343};
344
345#define PROP_ENUM(p,gen,n,list) do { \
346 struct nouveau_drm_prop_enum_list *l = (list); \
347 int c = 0; \
348 while (l->gen_mask) { \
349 if (l->gen_mask & (1 << (gen))) \
350 c++; \
351 l++; \
352 } \
353 if (c) { \
354 p = drm_property_create(dev, DRM_MODE_PROP_ENUM, n, c); \
355 l = (list); \
356 c = 0; \
357 while (p && l->gen_mask) { \
358 if (l->gen_mask & (1 << (gen))) { \
359 drm_property_add_enum(p, c, l->type, l->name); \
360 c++; \
361 } \
362 l++; \
363 } \
364 } \
365} while(0)
366
367int
368nouveau_display_init(struct drm_device *dev)
369{
370 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(dev);
371 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
372 struct drm_connector *connector;
373 int ret;
374
375 ret = disp->init(dev);
376 if (ret)
377 return ret;
378
379 /* enable polling for external displays */
380 if (!dev->mode_config.poll_enabled)
381 drm_kms_helper_poll_enable(dev);
382
383 /* enable hotplug interrupts */
384 list_for_each_entry(connector, &dev->mode_config.connector_list, head) {
385 struct nouveau_connector *conn = nouveau_connector(connector);
386 nvif_notify_get(&conn->hpd);
387 }
388
389 /* enable flip completion events */
390 nvif_notify_get(&drm->flip);
391 return ret;
392}
393
394void
395nouveau_display_fini(struct drm_device *dev)
396{
397 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(dev);
398 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
399 struct drm_connector *connector;
400 int head;
401
402 /* Make sure that drm and hw vblank irqs get properly disabled. */
403 for (head = 0; head < dev->mode_config.num_crtc; head++)
404 drm_vblank_off(dev, head);
405
406 /* disable flip completion events */
407 nvif_notify_put(&drm->flip);
408
409 /* disable hotplug interrupts */
410 list_for_each_entry(connector, &dev->mode_config.connector_list, head) {
411 struct nouveau_connector *conn = nouveau_connector(connector);
412 nvif_notify_put(&conn->hpd);
413 }
414
415 drm_kms_helper_poll_disable(dev);
416 disp->fini(dev);
417}
418
419static void
420nouveau_display_create_properties(struct drm_device *dev)
421{
422 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(dev);
423 int gen;
424
425 if (disp->disp.oclass < NV50_DISP)
426 gen = 0;
427 else
428 if (disp->disp.oclass < GF110_DISP)
429 gen = 1;
430 else
431 gen = 2;
432
433 PROP_ENUM(disp->dithering_mode, gen, "dithering mode", dither_mode);
434 PROP_ENUM(disp->dithering_depth, gen, "dithering depth", dither_depth);
435 PROP_ENUM(disp->underscan_property, gen, "underscan", underscan);
436
437 disp->underscan_hborder_property =
438 drm_property_create_range(dev, 0, "underscan hborder", 0, 128);
439
440 disp->underscan_vborder_property =
441 drm_property_create_range(dev, 0, "underscan vborder", 0, 128);
442
443 if (gen < 1)
444 return;
445
446 /* -90..+90 */
447 disp->vibrant_hue_property =
448 drm_property_create_range(dev, 0, "vibrant hue", 0, 180);
449
450 /* -100..+100 */
451 disp->color_vibrance_property =
452 drm_property_create_range(dev, 0, "color vibrance", 0, 200);
453}
454
455int
456nouveau_display_create(struct drm_device *dev)
457{
458 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
459 struct nvkm_device *device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
460 struct nouveau_display *disp;
461 int ret;
462
463 disp = drm->display = kzalloc(sizeof(*disp), GFP_KERNEL);
464 if (!disp)
465 return -ENOMEM;
466
467 drm_mode_config_init(dev);
468 drm_mode_create_scaling_mode_property(dev);
469 drm_mode_create_dvi_i_properties(dev);
470
471 dev->mode_config.funcs = &nouveau_mode_config_funcs;
472 dev->mode_config.fb_base = device->func->resource_addr(device, 1);
473
474 dev->mode_config.min_width = 0;
475 dev->mode_config.min_height = 0;
476 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_CELSIUS) {
477 dev->mode_config.max_width = 2048;
478 dev->mode_config.max_height = 2048;
479 } else
480 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
481 dev->mode_config.max_width = 4096;
482 dev->mode_config.max_height = 4096;
483 } else
484 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_FERMI) {
485 dev->mode_config.max_width = 8192;
486 dev->mode_config.max_height = 8192;
487 } else {
488 dev->mode_config.max_width = 16384;
489 dev->mode_config.max_height = 16384;
490 }
491
492 dev->mode_config.preferred_depth = 24;
493 dev->mode_config.prefer_shadow = 1;
494
495 if (drm->device.info.chipset < 0x11)
496 dev->mode_config.async_page_flip = false;
497 else
498 dev->mode_config.async_page_flip = true;
499
500 drm_kms_helper_poll_init(dev);
501 drm_kms_helper_poll_disable(dev);
502
503 if (nouveau_modeset != 2 && drm->vbios.dcb.entries) {
504 static const u16 oclass[] = {
505 GM204_DISP,
506 GM107_DISP,
507 GK110_DISP,
508 GK104_DISP,
509 GF110_DISP,
510 GT214_DISP,
511 GT206_DISP,
512 GT200_DISP,
513 G82_DISP,
514 NV50_DISP,
515 NV04_DISP,
516 };
517 int i;
518
519 for (i = 0, ret = -ENODEV; ret && i < ARRAY_SIZE(oclass); i++) {
520 ret = nvif_object_init(&drm->device.object, 0,
521 oclass[i], NULL, 0, &disp->disp);
522 }
523
524 if (ret == 0) {
525 nouveau_display_create_properties(dev);
526 if (disp->disp.oclass < NV50_DISP)
527 ret = nv04_display_create(dev);
528 else
529 ret = nv50_display_create(dev);
530 }
531 } else {
532 ret = 0;
533 }
534
535 if (ret)
536 goto disp_create_err;
537
538 if (dev->mode_config.num_crtc) {
539 ret = nouveau_display_vblank_init(dev);
540 if (ret)
541 goto vblank_err;
542 }
543
544 nouveau_backlight_init(dev);
545 return 0;
546
547vblank_err:
548 disp->dtor(dev);
549disp_create_err:
550 drm_kms_helper_poll_fini(dev);
551 drm_mode_config_cleanup(dev);
552 return ret;
553}
554
555void
556nouveau_display_destroy(struct drm_device *dev)
557{
558 struct nouveau_display *disp = nouveau_display(dev);
559
560 nouveau_backlight_exit(dev);
561 nouveau_display_vblank_fini(dev);
562
563 drm_kms_helper_poll_fini(dev);
564 drm_mode_config_cleanup(dev);
565
566 if (disp->dtor)
567 disp->dtor(dev);
568
569 nvif_object_fini(&disp->disp);
570
571 nouveau_drm(dev)->display = NULL;
572 kfree(disp);
573}
574
575int
576nouveau_display_suspend(struct drm_device *dev, bool runtime)
577{
578 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
579
580 nouveau_display_fini(dev);
581
582 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
583 struct nouveau_framebuffer *nouveau_fb;
584
585 nouveau_fb = nouveau_framebuffer(crtc->primary->fb);
586 if (!nouveau_fb || !nouveau_fb->nvbo)
587 continue;
588
589 nouveau_bo_unpin(nouveau_fb->nvbo);
590 }
591
592 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
593 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
594 if (nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo) {
595 if (nv_crtc->cursor.set_offset)
596 nouveau_bo_unmap(nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo);
597 nouveau_bo_unpin(nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo);
598 }
599 }
600
601 return 0;
602}
603
604void
605nouveau_display_resume(struct drm_device *dev, bool runtime)
606{
607 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
608 struct drm_crtc *crtc;
609 int ret, head;
610
611 /* re-pin fb/cursors */
612 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
613 struct nouveau_framebuffer *nouveau_fb;
614
615 nouveau_fb = nouveau_framebuffer(crtc->primary->fb);
616 if (!nouveau_fb || !nouveau_fb->nvbo)
617 continue;
618
619 ret = nouveau_bo_pin(nouveau_fb->nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM, true);
620 if (ret)
621 NV_ERROR(drm, "Could not pin framebuffer\n");
622 }
623
624 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
625 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
626 if (!nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo)
627 continue;
628
629 ret = nouveau_bo_pin(nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM, true);
630 if (!ret && nv_crtc->cursor.set_offset)
631 ret = nouveau_bo_map(nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo);
632 if (ret)
633 NV_ERROR(drm, "Could not pin/map cursor.\n");
634 }
635
636 nouveau_display_init(dev);
637
638 /* Force CLUT to get re-loaded during modeset */
639 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
640 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
641
642 nv_crtc->lut.depth = 0;
643 }
644
645 /* This should ensure we don't hit a locking problem when someone
646 * wakes us up via a connector. We should never go into suspend
647 * while the display is on anyways.
648 */
649 if (runtime)
650 return;
651
652 drm_helper_resume_force_mode(dev);
653
654 /* Make sure that drm and hw vblank irqs get resumed if needed. */
655 for (head = 0; head < dev->mode_config.num_crtc; head++)
656 drm_vblank_on(dev, head);
657
658 list_for_each_entry(crtc, &dev->mode_config.crtc_list, head) {
659 struct nouveau_crtc *nv_crtc = nouveau_crtc(crtc);
660
661 if (!nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo)
662 continue;
663
664 if (nv_crtc->cursor.set_offset)
665 nv_crtc->cursor.set_offset(nv_crtc, nv_crtc->cursor.nvbo->bo.offset);
666 nv_crtc->cursor.set_pos(nv_crtc, nv_crtc->cursor_saved_x,
667 nv_crtc->cursor_saved_y);
668 }
669}
670
671static int
672nouveau_page_flip_emit(struct nouveau_channel *chan,
673 struct nouveau_bo *old_bo,
674 struct nouveau_bo *new_bo,
675 struct nouveau_page_flip_state *s,
676 struct nouveau_fence **pfence)
677{
678 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = chan->fence;
679 struct nouveau_drm *drm = chan->drm;
680 struct drm_device *dev = drm->dev;
681 unsigned long flags;
682 int ret;
683
684 /* Queue it to the pending list */
685 spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->event_lock, flags);
686 list_add_tail(&s->head, &fctx->flip);
687 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->event_lock, flags);
688
689 /* Synchronize with the old framebuffer */
690 ret = nouveau_fence_sync(old_bo, chan, false, false);
691 if (ret)
692 goto fail;
693
694 /* Emit the pageflip */
695 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 2);
696 if (ret)
697 goto fail;
698
699 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_FERMI)
700 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubSw, NV_SW_PAGE_FLIP, 1);
701 else
702 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, FermiSw, NV_SW_PAGE_FLIP, 1);
703 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000000);
704 FIRE_RING (chan);
705
706 ret = nouveau_fence_new(chan, false, pfence);
707 if (ret)
708 goto fail;
709
710 return 0;
711fail:
712 spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->event_lock, flags);
713 list_del(&s->head);
714 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->event_lock, flags);
715 return ret;
716}
717
718int
719nouveau_crtc_page_flip(struct drm_crtc *crtc, struct drm_framebuffer *fb,
720 struct drm_pending_vblank_event *event, u32 flags)
721{
722 const int swap_interval = (flags & DRM_MODE_PAGE_FLIP_ASYNC) ? 0 : 1;
723 struct drm_device *dev = crtc->dev;
724 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
725 struct nouveau_bo *old_bo = nouveau_framebuffer(crtc->primary->fb)->nvbo;
726 struct nouveau_bo *new_bo = nouveau_framebuffer(fb)->nvbo;
727 struct nouveau_page_flip_state *s;
728 struct nouveau_channel *chan;
729 struct nouveau_cli *cli;
730 struct nouveau_fence *fence;
731 int ret;
732
733 chan = drm->channel;
734 if (!chan)
735 return -ENODEV;
736 cli = (void *)chan->user.client;
737
738 s = kzalloc(sizeof(*s), GFP_KERNEL);
739 if (!s)
740 return -ENOMEM;
741
742 if (new_bo != old_bo) {
743 ret = nouveau_bo_pin(new_bo, TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM, true);
744 if (ret)
745 goto fail_free;
746 }
747
748 mutex_lock(&cli->mutex);
749 ret = ttm_bo_reserve(&new_bo->bo, true, false, false, NULL);
750 if (ret)
751 goto fail_unpin;
752
753 /* synchronise rendering channel with the kernel's channel */
754 ret = nouveau_fence_sync(new_bo, chan, false, true);
755 if (ret) {
756 ttm_bo_unreserve(&new_bo->bo);
757 goto fail_unpin;
758 }
759
760 if (new_bo != old_bo) {
761 ttm_bo_unreserve(&new_bo->bo);
762
763 ret = ttm_bo_reserve(&old_bo->bo, true, false, false, NULL);
764 if (ret)
765 goto fail_unpin;
766 }
767
768 /* Initialize a page flip struct */
769 *s = (struct nouveau_page_flip_state)
770 { { }, event, nouveau_crtc(crtc)->index,
771 fb->bits_per_pixel, fb->pitches[0], crtc->x, crtc->y,
772 new_bo->bo.offset };
773
774 /* Keep vblanks on during flip, for the target crtc of this flip */
775 drm_vblank_get(dev, nouveau_crtc(crtc)->index);
776
777 /* Emit a page flip */
778 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
779 ret = nv50_display_flip_next(crtc, fb, chan, swap_interval);
780 if (ret)
781 goto fail_unreserve;
782 } else {
783 struct nv04_display *dispnv04 = nv04_display(dev);
784 int head = nouveau_crtc(crtc)->index;
785
786 if (swap_interval) {
787 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 8);
788 if (ret)
789 goto fail_unreserve;
790
791 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubImageBlit, 0x012c, 1);
792 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
793 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubImageBlit, 0x0134, 1);
794 OUT_RING (chan, head);
795 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubImageBlit, 0x0100, 1);
796 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
797 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubImageBlit, 0x0130, 1);
798 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
799 }
800
801 nouveau_bo_ref(new_bo, &dispnv04->image[head]);
802 }
803
804 ret = nouveau_page_flip_emit(chan, old_bo, new_bo, s, &fence);
805 if (ret)
806 goto fail_unreserve;
807 mutex_unlock(&cli->mutex);
808
809 /* Update the crtc struct and cleanup */
810 crtc->primary->fb = fb;
811
812 nouveau_bo_fence(old_bo, fence, false);
813 ttm_bo_unreserve(&old_bo->bo);
814 if (old_bo != new_bo)
815 nouveau_bo_unpin(old_bo);
816 nouveau_fence_unref(&fence);
817 return 0;
818
819fail_unreserve:
820 drm_vblank_put(dev, nouveau_crtc(crtc)->index);
821 ttm_bo_unreserve(&old_bo->bo);
822fail_unpin:
823 mutex_unlock(&cli->mutex);
824 if (old_bo != new_bo)
825 nouveau_bo_unpin(new_bo);
826fail_free:
827 kfree(s);
828 return ret;
829}
830
831int
832nouveau_finish_page_flip(struct nouveau_channel *chan,
833 struct nouveau_page_flip_state *ps)
834{
835 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = chan->fence;
836 struct nouveau_drm *drm = chan->drm;
837 struct drm_device *dev = drm->dev;
838 struct nouveau_page_flip_state *s;
839 unsigned long flags;
840
841 spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->event_lock, flags);
842
843 if (list_empty(&fctx->flip)) {
844 NV_ERROR(drm, "unexpected pageflip\n");
845 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->event_lock, flags);
846 return -EINVAL;
847 }
848
849 s = list_first_entry(&fctx->flip, struct nouveau_page_flip_state, head);
850 if (s->event) {
851 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
852 drm_arm_vblank_event(dev, s->crtc, s->event);
853 } else {
854 drm_send_vblank_event(dev, s->crtc, s->event);
855
856 /* Give up ownership of vblank for page-flipped crtc */
857 drm_vblank_put(dev, s->crtc);
858 }
859 }
860 else {
861 /* Give up ownership of vblank for page-flipped crtc */
862 drm_vblank_put(dev, s->crtc);
863 }
864
865 list_del(&s->head);
866 if (ps)
867 *ps = *s;
868 kfree(s);
869
870 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->event_lock, flags);
871 return 0;
872}
873
874int
875nouveau_flip_complete(struct nvif_notify *notify)
876{
877 struct nouveau_drm *drm = container_of(notify, typeof(*drm), flip);
878 struct nouveau_channel *chan = drm->channel;
879 struct nouveau_page_flip_state state;
880
881 if (!nouveau_finish_page_flip(chan, &state)) {
882 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
883 nv_set_crtc_base(drm->dev, state.crtc, state.offset +
884 state.y * state.pitch +
885 state.x * state.bpp / 8);
886 }
887 }
888
889 return NVIF_NOTIFY_KEEP;
890}
891
892int
893nouveau_display_dumb_create(struct drm_file *file_priv, struct drm_device *dev,
894 struct drm_mode_create_dumb *args)
895{
896 struct nouveau_bo *bo;
897 uint32_t domain;
898 int ret;
899
900 args->pitch = roundup(args->width * (args->bpp / 8), 256);
901 args->size = args->pitch * args->height;
902 args->size = roundup(args->size, PAGE_SIZE);
903
904 /* Use VRAM if there is any ; otherwise fallback to system memory */
905 if (nouveau_drm(dev)->device.info.ram_size != 0)
906 domain = NOUVEAU_GEM_DOMAIN_VRAM;
907 else
908 domain = NOUVEAU_GEM_DOMAIN_GART;
909
910 ret = nouveau_gem_new(dev, args->size, 0, domain, 0, 0, &bo);
911 if (ret)
912 return ret;
913
914 ret = drm_gem_handle_create(file_priv, &bo->gem, &args->handle);
915 drm_gem_object_unreference_unlocked(&bo->gem);
916 return ret;
917}
918
919int
920nouveau_display_dumb_map_offset(struct drm_file *file_priv,
921 struct drm_device *dev,
922 uint32_t handle, uint64_t *poffset)
923{
924 struct drm_gem_object *gem;
925
926 gem = drm_gem_object_lookup(dev, file_priv, handle);
927 if (gem) {
928 struct nouveau_bo *bo = nouveau_gem_object(gem);
929 *poffset = drm_vma_node_offset_addr(&bo->bo.vma_node);
930 drm_gem_object_unreference_unlocked(gem);
931 return 0;
932 }
933
934 return -ENOENT;
935}
